title: ZPC Macintosh classic shooter
description:
Hi,
 Heres a classic Macos  image of ZPC,  i will quote wikipedia to save space

"ZPC (Zero Population Count) is a first-person shooter computer game developed by Zombie LLC in 1996 which uses the Marathon 2 engine. It was noted for its stylized look adapted from artwork by Aidan Hughes (also credited with the game's concept). The story focuses on Arman, an exiled "Warrior Messiah" who has come of age and sets out to reclaim his throne."

that was the Wiki,

Do you happen to be fond of KMFDM records cover art?,
Well this game is for You.

The image works on 9.2.2, youll have to burn it someway, or mount it, i have no way to transfer it to .SMI,
 The CDROM needs to be in the tray or the image mounted in order to work, thats why i hate Mac Os X. 

this release includes all the maps and the music, (quite good, from a memeber of Ministry.)
 
   The look and feel of the game, its that facist , totalitarian thing.

Seemed to be missing in action for a while.

enjoy.

If you are so grateful, give me hand on this, ive been trying to download a dead torrent for some months

its a music CD rip . From the band Robot, the album is "Fake or Real"
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4517142/Robot_-_Fake_Or_Real__(2000)_[160kbps_AAC]" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4517142/Robot_-_Fake_Or_Real__(2000)_[160kbps_AAC]</a>

if You have it or know somebody that does, please seed, or pass the owrd

and dont forget to seed ZPC. this is maybe the last time in your lifespan youll be seeing this again
